name: up941847: ant vs bombs
description:
You( the ant) vs some weird bombs that want to stop you from getting to the strawberries. Your job is to get as many strawberries as possible. The game will end when you have been hit by the bombs. The controls will be the mouse, the ant will try and follow the mouse, but he likes to make circles, so have fun with that. XD

Incase it does not play, for what ever reason, here is a link. https://www.greenfoot.org/scenarios/24563
